name: IWANTTOPAY
description:
A game set in an alternate reality where Commodore made DOS.

There has been a massive hacking attack because of a bug in CommoDos-Mail.

Look through all your mails and try to get your daughter back from kidnappers... who look familiar...

The game is written in Batch, I know .bat files are pretty sketchy but if you want you can just open it with notepad or something. It WILL spoil the game though.
